Headline: Yellow Line Service Temporarily Suspended
ShortDescription: Service on the Yellow Line has been temporarily suspended due to an incident at Howard

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Yellow Line has been temporarily suspended due to an incident at Howard.

Shuttle bus service is available between Howard and Skokie/Dempster, serving all affected stations during normal hours of operation.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include the #97 Skokie bus route.

We are working to restore service as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #7 Harrison Temporary Westbound Reroute near Independence/Congress
ShortDescription: Westbound 7 Harrison  buses are temporarily rerouted via Congress, Independence, Jackson and Pulaski: due to, street blockage near  Independence/Congress.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #7 Harrison  buses are temporarily rerouted via Congress, Independence, Jackson and Pulaski: due to, street blockage near  Independence/Congress.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #90 HarlemTemporary Reroute at Harlem/Diversey
ShortDescription: 90 Harlem buses are temporarily rerouted via Harlem, Diversey, Oak Park and Grand: due to, street blockage near Harlem/Diversey.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#90 Harlem buses are temporarily rerouted via Harlem, Diversey, Oak Park and Grand: due to, street blockage near Harlem/Diversey.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at 63rd. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at 63rd. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
